entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:21 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 20 km/h except 60 gusting to 100 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:29 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:29 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:29 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 29. Forecast issued 05:29 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 24. Forecast issued 05:29 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
